text: Yakhana tini mada'iyanera kupera dhare pauchalena, takhana kupera kache ekadala lokake pelena tara jantuderake pani pana karanora kaje rata. Ebam tadera pascate duâ€™jana strilokake dekhalena tara tadera jantuderake agaliye rakhache. Tini balalena, tomadera ki byapara? Tara balala, amara amadera jantuderake pani pana karate pari na, ye paryanta rakhalara tadera jantuderake niye sare na yaya. Amadera pita khuba'i brd'dha.
